title: Apple 61W USB-C Power Adapter (with power cord)
description: Apple 61W USB-C power adapter. Includes the AC power cord (no USB-C cable). Gently used, works perfectly.

title: Apple 61W USB-C Power Adapter (no power cord)
description: Apple 61W USB-C power adapter only. No AC power cord and no USB-C cable. Gently used, works perfectly.
